article_title: Chattanooga-based business benefits association, BOBA, seeks to go national

article_metadata.description: BOBA will be hosting a health insurance enrollment event Thursday, March 20, from 4-7 pm at the Fairfield Inn & Suites located at 2345 Shallowford Village Drive.
